alert.note: Alert for Benton; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Benton and southeastern Stearns Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Rockville, or 10 miles southwest of St. Cloud, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Waite Park and St. Joseph around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sartell and Sauk Rapids. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 160 and 172. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 172 and 179. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
